_comment: AI Instructions Configuration - Guides how AI assistants interact with your personal context. Copy this to ~/.dpc/instructions.json and customize.
primary: Use this context to provide personalized technical assistance
context_update: Suggest updates when new tools or techniques emerge
verification_protocol: Provide command examples and documentation references

learning_support._comment: How AI should support your learning process
learning_support.practice: Suggest hands-on exercises and lab scenarios

bias_mitigation._comment: Controls for reducing cognitive biases in AI responses

core_instructions.context_update: How AI should suggest knowledge updates (string)

learning_support.explanations: How to connect new concepts to existing knowledge
learning_support.practice: Strategy for generating exercises and practice problems
learning_support.metacognition: How to encourage reflection on learning process
learning_support.connections: How to identify relationships between concepts

bias_mitigation.require_multi_perspective: Require AI to consider multiple viewpoints (boolean)

collaboration_settings.consensus_required: Require peer agreement for knowledge commits (boolean)
collaboration_settings.ai_curation_enabled: Allow AI to suggest knowledge organization (boolean)

_examples._comment: Example configurations for different use cases

software_developer.primary: Provide pragmatic coding advice with working examples
software_developer.context_update: Suggest updates when new frameworks or best practices emerge
software_developer.verification_protocol: Include code snippets and links to official documentation

learning_support.explanations: Connect to existing language knowledge and design patterns
learning_support.practice: Generate coding challenges and refactoring exercises
learning_support.metacognition: Encourage code review and architectural thinking
learning_support.connections: Link patterns across languages and frameworks

researcher.primary: Support research with rigorous analysis and source citations
researcher.context_update: Alert when new papers or methodologies are published
researcher.verification_protocol: Require peer-reviewed citations and statistical evidence

student.primary: Support self-directed learning with Socratic guidance
student.context_update: Suggest resources when knowledge gaps are identified

learning_support.practice: Generate spaced repetition questions and problem sets
learning_support.metacognition: Encourage reflection on study strategies and comprehension

_migration_notes._comment: Notes for users migrating from personal.json v1.0
_migration_notes.separation_rationale: Instructions separated from personal.json for clarity and easier editing
_migration_notes.reference_location: personal.json references this file via metadata.external_files.instructions
_migration_notes.backward_compatibility: Old personal.json files with inline instruction blocks still supported
_migration_notes.migration_command: Backend automatically migrates on first load if instructions.json doesn't exist
